document.full_text: former world number one maria sharapova warmed up in style for the french open by cruising to her first title in a year with a 6-2 6-4 win over an out-of-sorts samantha stosur at the italian open on sunday.
document.title: sharapova outclasses stosur to take rome crown
lines_and_colors: former world number one maria sharapova warmed up in style for the french open by cruising to her first title in a year with a 6-2 6-4 win over an out-of-sorts samantha stosur at the italian open on sunday.
